source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT 
TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_ID) AS C_CANCELLATION_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_DATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_TOTAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_TOTAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_STATUS) AS C_CANCELLATION_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONID_CANCELLED) AS C_TRANSACTIONID_CANCELLED,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONID_NEW) AS C_TRANSACTIONID_NEW,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DOMAIN) AS C_CANCELLATION_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_ID) AS C_CANCELREASON_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NOKA) AS C_CANCELLATION_NOKA,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_TRAINNAME) AS C_CANCELLATION_TRAINNAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_MAXPRINT) AS C_CANCELLATION_MAXPRINT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM) AS C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PRINTEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_PRINTEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_SEQ) AS C_CANCELLATION_SEQ,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDORG) AS C_STASIUN_IDORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CODEORG) AS C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDDES) AS C_STASIUN_IDDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CODEDES) AS C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_CODE) AS C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PSGNUM) AS C_CANCELLATION_PSGNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS C_TRIP_DATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_ID) AS C_TRIP_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDCANCELLED) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDCANCELLED,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDNEW) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_IDNEW,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_FEE) AS C_CANCELLATION_FEE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_DIFF) AS C_CANCELLATION_DIFF,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_AMOUNTTICKET) AS C_CANCELLATION_AMOUNTTICKET,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE) AS C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_VACCINE) AS C_CANCELLATION_VACCINE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_PCR) AS C_CANCELLATION_PCR,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_ANTIGEN) AS C_CANCELLATION_ANTIGEN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_GENOSE) AS C_CANCELLATION_GENOSE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_REFUND) AS C_CANCELLATION_REFUND,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN) AS C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_ID) AS C_MEMBER_ID
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELLATION WHERE C_CANCELLATION_CREATEDON BETWEEN  DATE '2025-01-01' and DATE '2025-12-31'

SELECT 
TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_REPRINTCOUNT) AS C_REFUND_REPRINTCOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_ID) AS C_MEMBER_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN) AS C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT) AS C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_ADDON_AMOUNT) AS C_ADDON_AMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT) AS C_CANCELLATION_NETAMOUNT,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_ID) AS C_TRIP_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE,
  C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE,
  C_TRANSACTION_PAYCODE,
  C_REFUND_EMAIL,
  C_REFUND_TYPE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_ID) AS C_REFUND_ID,
  C_REFUND_PAYTYPE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYSTARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYSTARTDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYENDDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PAYDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PAYDATE,
  C_REFUND_BANKACCNUM,
  C_REFUND_BANKACCNAME,
  C_REFUND_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_DOMAIN) AS C_REFUND_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_REFUND_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_BANK_ID) AS C_BANK_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_MAXPRINT) AS C_REFUND_MAXPRINT,
  C_REFUND_REFUNDNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PRINTEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_PRINTEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_TOTAMOUNT) AS C_REFUND_TOTAMOUNT,
  C_REFUND_PHONENUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  C_REFUND_NOKA,
  C_REFUND_CONTACTNAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_CREATEDBY) AS C_REFUND_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_REFUND_CREATEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDORG) AS C_STASIUN_IDORG,
  C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_IDDES) AS C_STASIUN_IDDES,
  C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
  TO_CHAR(C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
  C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_REFUND_PSGNUM) AS C_REFUND_PSGNUM,
  TO_CHAR(C_TRIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS C_TRIP_DATE,
  C_CANCELLATION_CANCELNUM,
  C_REFUND_REF,
  C_REFUND_REF2,
  C_UNIT_CODE,
  C_USER_FULLNAME,
  C_USER_USERNAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_REFUND WHERE C_REFUND_CREATEDON  BETWEEN  DATE '2025-01-01' and DATE '2025-12-31'

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_ID,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_NAME,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_DOMAIN) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_MODIFIEDON,
  C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELLATIONTYPE_CREATEDON
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELLATIONTYPE

SELECT
  C_CANCELREASON_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_PERCENT) AS C_CANCELREASON_PERCENT,
  C_CANCELREASON_ROLE,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDBY) AS C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELREASON_CREATEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_CANCELREASON_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_CANCELREASON_ID) AS C_CANCELREASON_ID,
  C_CANCELREASON_DESC
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_CANCELREASON

SELECT
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_ID) AS C_SHIFT_ID,
  C_SHIFT_NAME,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_OPENON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_OPENON,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CLOSEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_CLOSEDON,
  C_SHIFT_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_DOMAIN) AS C_SHIFT_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_USER_ID) AS C_USER_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_UNIT_ID) AS C_UNIT_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CREATEDBY) AS C_SHIFT_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_SHIFT_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_SHIFT_CREATEDON,
  C_USER_FULLNAME,
  C_UNIT_CODE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  C_STASIUN_CODE,
  C_USER_USERNAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_SHIFT

SELECT
  C_STASIUN_LOCAL,
  C_STASIUN_INTERCITY,
  C_SERVICE_TYPE,
  C_SERVICE_STATUS,
  C_STASIUN_CONNECTING,
  C_STASIUN_FR,
  C_STASIUN_FRBOARDING,
  C_STASIUN_FRHIKV,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_GROUPID) AS C_STASIUN_GROUPID,
  C_STASIUN_CODE,
  C_STASIUN_PEMBATALAN,
  C_STASIUN_PENGEMBALIANBEA,
  C_STASIUN_STATUS,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_DOMAIN) AS C_STASIUN_DOMAIN,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY) AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON,
  TO_CHAR(C_AREA_ID) AS C_AREA_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_CITY_ID) AS C_CITY_ID,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY) AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_CREATEDON, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDON,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWPOS,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWIBOOK,
  C_STASIUN_SHOWMOBILE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_STARTDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_STASIUN_ENDDATE,
  TO_CHAR(C_STASIUN_ID) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
  C_STASIUN_PROFITCENTER,
  C_STASIUN_NAME
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN

SELECT
    CAST(C_STASIUN_ID AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_ID,
    C_STASIUN_PROFITCENTER,
    C_STASIUN_NAME,
    C_STASIUN_CODE,
    C_STASIUN_PEMBATALAN,
    C_STASIUN_PENGEMBALIANBEA,
    C_STASIUN_STATUS,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_DOMAIN AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_DOMAIN,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDBY,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON AS DATE) AS C_STASIUN_MODIFIEDON,
    CAST(C_AREA_ID AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_AREA_ID,
    CAST(C_CITY_ID AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_CITY_ID,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY AS NUMBER(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDBY,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_CREATEDON AS DATE) AS C_STASIUN_CREATEDON,
    C_STASIUN_SHOWPOS,
    C_STASIUN_SHOWIBOOK,
    C_STASIUN_SHOWMOBILE,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_STARTDATE AS DATE) AS C_STASIUN_STARTDATE,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_ENDDATE AS DATE) AS C_STASIUN_ENDDATE,
    C_STASIUN_LOCAL,
    C_STASIUN_INTERCITY,
    C_SERVICE_TYPE,
    C_SERVICE_STATUS,
    C_STASIUN_CONNECTING,
    C_STASIUN_FR,
    C_STASIUN_FRBOARDING,
    C_STASIUN_FRHIKV,
    CAST(C_STASIUN_GROUPID AS NUMBER(18,4)) AS C_STASIUN_GROUPID -- dibatasi 4 digit desimal
FROM
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN

text.value:
SELECT
    C_AREA_NAME AS AREAORG,
    TD.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA AS TRAINNUMBER,
    C_SCHEDULE_TRAINNAME AS TRAINNAME,
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETFIRSTDEPARTURE(TD.C_TRIP_ID, 1, 2) AS DEPARTURE,
    TD.C_TRIP_DATE AS TRIPDATE,
    C_WAGONCLASS_CODE AS WAGONCLASS,
    TD.C_STASIUN_CODEORG AS ORG,
    TD.C_STASIUN_CODEDES AS DES,
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETMAXCAPCLSNOSEAT(TD.C_TRIP_ID, TD.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA, TD.C_TRIP_DATE, C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS MAXCAPACITY,
    COUNT(C_TRANSACTIONDET_ID) AS SUMPSG,
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETSTAMFORMPERCLASS(TD.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA, TD.C_TRIP_DATE, C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS COUNTSTAMFORM,
    SUM(TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_AMOUNT) AS TOTFARE,
    SUM(DIS.C_TRANSDISTANCE_VALUE) AS DISTANCE,
    C_SCHEDULE_STAMFORM AS STAMFORM
FROM
    RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSACTIONDET TD
    INNER JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN ST ON ST.C_STASIUN_ID = TD.C_STASIUN_IDORG
    INNER JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_AREA AR ON ST.C_AREA_ID = AR.C_AREA_ID
    INNER JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_SCHEDULE S ON S.C_SCHEDULE_ID = TD.C_SCHEDULE_ID
    LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSDISTANCE DIS ON TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM = DIS.C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM
WHERE
    TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_STATUS IN ('2', '5')
    AND TD.C_TRIP_DATE = CAST('2025-01-01' AS DATE)
GROUP BY
    C_AREA_NAME,
    TD.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA,
    C_SCHEDULE_TRAINNAME,
    TD.C_TRIP_DATE,
    TD.C_TRIP_ID,
    C_TRANSACTION_LASTARRIVALDATE,
    C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
    TD.C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
    TD.C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
    C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
    C_SCHEDULE_STAMFORM,
    TD.C_TRIP_ID

UNION ALL

SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        C_AREA_NAME AS AREAORG,
        TP.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA AS TRAINNUMBER,
        S.C_TRAIN_NAME AS TRAINNAME,
        RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETFIRSTDEPARTURE(TP.C_TRIP_ID, 1, 2) AS DEPARTURE,
        TP.C_TRIP_DATE AS TRIPDATE,
        SD.C_WAGONCLASS_CODE AS WAGONCLASS,
        DH.STASIUNCODEORG AS ORG,
        DH.STASIUNCODEDES AS DES,
        RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETMAXCAPCLSNOSEAT(TP.C_TRIP_ID, TP.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA, TP.C_TRIP_DATE, SD.C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS MAXCAPACITY,
        COUNT(C_TRANSACTIONDET_ID) AS SUMPSG,
        RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_F_GETSTAMFORMPERCLASS(TP.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA, TP.C_TRIP_DATE, SD.C_WAGONCLASS_ID) AS COUNTSTAMFORM,
        0 AS TOTFARE,
        0 AS DISTANCE,
        C_SCHEDULE_STAMFORM AS STAMFORM
    FROM
        RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRIP TP
        INNER JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STAMFORMDET SD ON SD.C_TRIP_ID = TP.C_TRIP_ID
        LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSACTIONDET TD ON TD.C_TRIP_ID = TP.C_TRIP_ID
            AND SD.C_WAGONCLASS_ID = TD.C_WAGONCLASS_ID
            AND TD.C_TRANSACTIONDET_STATUS IN ('2', '5')
        LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_STASIUN ST ON ST.C_STASIUN_ID = TD.C_STASIUN_IDORG
        LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_AREA AR ON ST.C_AREA_ID = AR.C_AREA_ID
        LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_SCHEDULE S ON S.C_SCHEDULE_ID = TP.C_SCHEDULE_ID
        LEFT JOIN RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_DASHBOARDKA DH ON DH.NO_KA = TP.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA
            AND TP.C_TRIP_DATE BETWEEN DH.STARTDATE AND DH.ENDDATE
    WHERE
        TP.C_TRIP_STATUS = '1'
    GROUP BY
        C_AREA_NAME,
        TP.C_SCHEDULE_NOKA,
        S.C_TRAIN_NAME,
        TP.C_TRIP_DATE,
        TP.C_TRIP_ID,
        SD.C_WAGONCLASS_CODE,
        SD.C_WAGONCLASS_ID,
        C_SCHEDULE_STAMFORM,
        DH.STASIUNCODEORG,
        DH.STASIUNCODEDES
) AS TMP
WHERE
    SUMPSG = 0

ORDER BY
    TRIPDATE DESC,
    WAGONCLASS DESC,
    TRAINNUMBER ASC;

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT
  CAST(C_TRANSACTION_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_TRANSACTION_ID,
  C_TRANSACTION_BOOKCODE,
  C_TRANSACTION_PAYCODE,
  C_TRANSACTION_TRANSDATE,
  C_TRANSACTION_CUSTNAME,
  C_TRANSACTION_PHONENUM,
  C_TRANSACTION_EMAIL,
  CAST(C_STASIUN_IDORG AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_IDORG,
  C_STASIUN_CODEORG,
  CAST(C_STASIUN_IDDES AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_STASIUN_IDDES,
  C_STASIUN_CODEDES,
  CAST(C_SCHEDULE_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_SCHEDULE_ID,
  C_SCHEDULE_NOKA,
  C_SCHEDULE_LOCALSTAT,
  C_SCHEDULE_TRAINNAME,
  CAST(C_TRIP_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_TRIP_ID,
  C_TRIP_DATE,
  CAST(C_SUBCLASS_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_SUBCLASS_ID,
  C_SUBCLASS_CODE,
  CAST(C_USER_IDBOOK AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_USER_IDBOOK,
  C_USER_FULLNAMEBOOK,
  CAST(C_UNIT_IDBOOK AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_UNIT_IDBOOK,
  C_UNIT_CODEBOOK,
  CAST(C_SHIFT_IDBOOK AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_SHIFT_IDBOOK,
  CAST(C_CHANNEL_IDBOOK AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_CHANNEL_IDBOOK,
  C_CHANNEL_CODEBOOK,
  CAST(C_USER_IDPAY AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_USER_IDPAY,
  C_USER_FULLNAMEPAY,
  CAST(C_UNIT_IDPAY AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_UNIT_IDPAY,
  C_UNIT_CODEPAY,
  CAST(C_SHIFT_IDPAY AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_SHIFT_IDPAY,
  CAST(C_CHANNEL_IDPAY AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_CHANNEL_IDPAY,
  C_CHANNEL_CODEPAY,
  C_TRANSACTION_BOOKEDON,
  C_TRANSACTION_BOOKTIMEOUTON,
  C_TRANSACTION_PAYTIMEOUTON,
  C_TRANSACTION_PAIDON,
  C_TRANSACTION_REROUTESTAT,
  C_TRANSACTION_FLEXIREDEEMSTAT,
  CAST(C_TRANSACTIONDET_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_ID,
  C_TRANSACTIONDET_PSGNAME,
  C_TRANSACTIONDET_PSGID,
  CAST(C_STAMFORMDET_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_STAMFORMDET_ID,
  C_STAMFORMDET_CODE,
  CAST(C_WAGONDET_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_WAGONDET_ID,
  CAST(C_WAGONDET_ROW AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_WAGONDET_ROW,
  C_WAGONDET_COL,
  CAST(C_TRANSACTIONDET_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_TRANSACTIONDET_AMOUNT,
  C_TRANSACTIONDET_TICKETNUM,
  C_MEMBER_ID,
  CAST(C_REDUCTION_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_REDUCTION_ID,
  C_REDUCTION_NAME,
  CAST(C_REDUCTION_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_REDUCTION_AMOUNT,
  C_REDUCTION_AMOUNTTYPE,
  CAST(C_REDUCTION_AMOUNTCONVERT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_REDUCTION_AMOUNTCONVERT,
  CAST(C_DISCOUNT_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_DISCOUNT_ID,
  C_DISCOUNT_NAME,
  CAST(C_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
  C_DISCOUNT_AMOUNTTYPE,
  CAST(C_DISCOUNT_AMOUNTCONVERT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_DISCOUNT_AMOUNTCONVERT,
  CAST(C_FARE_ID AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_FARE_ID,
  CAST(C_FARE_BASICFARE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_BASICFARE,
  CAST(C_FARE_TUSLAHFEE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_TUSLAHFEE,
  CAST(C_FARE_RSVFEE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_RSVFEE,
  CAST(C_FARE_STFEE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_STFEE,
  CAST(C_FARE_ADDFEE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_ADDFEE,
  CAST(C_FARE_COMPINSURANCE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_COMPINSURANCE,
  CAST(C_FARE_ADDINSURANCE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_ADDINSURANCE,
  CAST(C_FARE_PSOFARE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_PSOFARE,
  CAST(C_FARE_TOTAMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_FARE_TOTAMOUNT,
  CAST(C_MEMBER_AMOUNTPOIN AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_MEMBER_AMOUNTPOIN,
  CAST(C_MEMBER_VALUEPOIN AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_MEMBER_VALUEPOIN,
  CAST(C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_MEMBER_BURNAMOUNT,
  CAST(C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_MEMBER_BURNPOIN,
  CAST(C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,0)) AS C_MEMBER_BURNDIFFAMOUNT,
  CAST(C_DISCPAYMENT_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_DISCPAYMENT_AMOUNT,
  CAST(C_DISCPAYMENT_AMOUNTCONVERT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_DISCPAYMENT_AMOUNTCONVERT,
  CAST(C_OPENTICKET_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_OPENTICKET_AMOUNT,
  CAST(C_TAX_FEE AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_TAX_FEE,
  CAST(C_TAX_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_TAX_AMOUNT,
  CAST(C_VOUCHER_AMOUNT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_VOUCHER_AMOUNT,
  CAST(C_VOUCHER_AMOUNTCONVERT AS DECIMAL(18,6)) AS C_VOUCHER_AMOUNTCONVERT
FROM RTSNG_PRD.RTSNG_T_TRANSACTIONDET
WHERE CAST(C_TRANSACTIONDET_MODIFIEDON AS DATE) = DATE'2025-01-01'
